channel.title: Saving the last 5 messages as strings?
channel.description:
How do you save the last 5 messages you say as strings? For example if you say
Hi My Name Is Stanyer
The strings would be
"Hi" "My" "Name" "Is" "Stanyer"
Then if you send
I'm 15
The strings would be
"Name" "Is" "Stanyer" "I'm" "15"
Because when you say a new message is pushes them up sorta thing.
Thanks<3

item.title: Saving the last 5 messages as strings?
item.dc:creator: @Stanyer Stanyer
item.description:
@Stanyer wrote:

How do you save the last 5 messages you say as strings? For example if you say

Hi
My
Name
Is
Stanyer

The strings would be

“Hi”
“My”
“Name”
“Is”
“Stanyer”

Then if you send

I’m
15

The strings would be

“Name”
“Is”
“Stanyer”
“I’m”
“15”

Because when you say a new message is pushes them up sorta thing.

Thanks<3

Read full topic
item.source: Saving the last 5 messages as strings?
